title: Addition Binomial Square Formula
text: We compare our expression to the addition binomial square formula: $${\left(a+b\right)}^2=a^2+2a b+b^2$$.
speech: We compare our expression to the addition binomial square formula:  parentheses a plus b,  squared is equal to a squared plus 2 a b, plus b squared .
pacedSpeech: We compare our expression to the addition binomial square formula:    a plus b,  squared is equal to a squared plus 2 a b, plus b squared

title: Compare the Binomial\n
speech: parentheses a plus b,  squared \n, parentheses, y plus 1 fourth,  squared

title: Identify a
text: What is a in the expression?

title: Identify $$b$$
speech: What is  b  in the expression?

title: Plug in the Terms
text: Substitute $$a=y$$ and $$b=\frac{1}{4}$$ into the addition binomial square formula:\n$${\left(a+b\right)}^2=a^2+2a b+b^2$$\n$${\left(y+\frac{1}{4}\right)}^2=y^2+\frac{2y\times1}{4}+{\left(\frac{1}{4}\right)}^2$$
speech: Substitute  a is equal to y  and  b, is equal to 1 fourth  into the addition binomial square formula:\n, parentheses a plus b,  squared is equal to a squared plus 2 a b, plus b squared \n, parentheses, y plus 1 fourth,  squared is equal to y squared plus, fraction, 2 y times 1, over 4,  plus, parentheses 1 fourth  squared

and   b, is equal to 1 fourth

, , y plus 1 fourth,  squared is equal to y squared plus, fraction, 2 y times 1, over 4,  plus,  1 fourth  squared

title: Simplify
speech: y squared plus 1 half y plus 1 over 16
